data.title: Curriculum | Part-time Flex MBA
data.meta_description: Rooted in the fundamentals, coursework will consist of 45 credits, half of which are required core courses. Take core and elective courses in any sequence.
data.text:
Our flexible Part-Time Flex MBA curriculum is rooted in the fundamentals of business. Your coursework will consist of 45 credits, half of which are required core courses. Beyond the core, youâ€™ll choose elective courses to customize your degree and spend time on the topics and skills that matter to you and your career growth. You can take core and elective courses in virtually any sequence.

Each semester, choose courses in the format that works for you - 100% online, in-person or hybrid. Mix and match class formats, electives and graduate certificates to create an MBA personalized to your needs.

Our academic advisors will guide you every step of the way to help you design your own plan of study.
